attributes.action: INCREASE TIME FOR PEOPLE WHEN THE TRAIN CLOSES THE DOORS.
attributes.additional_details: I have seen soo many people in the overground missing Thier train because of a few seconds delay and have to wait 15 mins in the sufferget line. This makes me quite sad I as I couldn't do anything to help them. I believe this petition will hopefully help people get Thier train and reach on time for Thier journey.
attributes.background: When the trains closes doors, The drivers should wait 10 seconds before fully locking the doors before departure

rejection.details: This is a matter for TFL, not the UK Government or Parliament.
